turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I will like to order a pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like: Large, Medium, Small?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll go with the large, thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pepperoni will do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add anything else, how about a drink or bread sticks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, I'll have a coke.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What about the bread sticks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No bread sticks for me, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, will that complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yea, I think that's about it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, should we use the card on file?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that will do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is the address on file correct as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that the correct address.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! your receipt has been sent to your mobile device via text message

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I see it,

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome your pizza will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank You!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your Welcome.
